name: Menari diperapian | Meta Visual Poetry series [4]
description:
This poem is the embodiment when a human soul is at its lowest point. all thoughts enter causing confusion that makes us lose control. Emptiness, depression, anxiety, are factors that lead to hopelessness for the life that is being lived.

All meaningless actions, all expectations poisoned with inferiority. 

*This poem is written in Indonesian. To make it easier for you, I provide a translation in English. maybe this English does not cover the whole meaning (because of the difference in meaning equivalent), but hopefully the essence of this poem is conveyed. 

Dancing In the Fireplace
4. 
There is nothing better than being alone in front of the Lonely
Isolating myself from the emotions that never stop loving oneself
Being overwhelmed by an ego that is said to be caring.

I dim the light of happiness that envy to the heart's
Manifested in the hungry Sufi on earth
Dreaming of life waiting to die. 

From morning till morning
Love and ego will rule the heart
Grounded in a soul thirsting for love blossoms
And want to rule itself 
With a few words of scary.
 
-arifansdr- 
2017.
